short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extention to remove video recommendations on youtube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a small extension for chrome to help you watch YouTube videos without the suggestions on the right side. Made for people who are easily distracted but use YouTube as one of your research platforms for work.  Also hides Whatsapp chats on Whatsapp web.
